`BioStat` â€“ Convenience Functions for Statistical Analysis
===========================================================

`BioStat` is an `R` package that contais a collection of supplementary 
functions for biostatistics and biometry lectures.

***

**Package is under development** and some functions and default seting may 
change significantly.

***

## Install package

To install a developement version of the package from `GitHub`:

```{r Install package, eval=FALSE}
if (!"devtools" %in% installed.packages()) install.packages("devtools")

devtools::install_github("GegznaV/BioStat")
```
